text: The 1958 season was the Hawthorn Football Club's 34th season in the Victorian Football League and 57th overall. ==Fixture== ===Night Series Cup=== The night series went back to the format with only the teams that didn't qualify for finals competing in the series. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%; text-align:center; width: 100%; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto" ! rowspan="2"| Rd ! rowspan="2"| Date and local time ! rowspan="2"| Opponent ! colspan="3"| Scores (Hawthorn's scores indicated in bold) ! rowspan="2"| Venue ! rowspan="2"| Attendance |- ! Home ! Away ! Result |- style="background:#cfc" ! 1 | align=left| Tuesday, 9 September | align=left| | 9.19 (73) | 4.20 (44) | Won by 29 points | Lake Oval | 17,850 |- style="background:#fcc;" ! Semi Final | align=left| Tuesday, 16 September | align=left| | 13.13 (91) | 6.10 (46) | Lost by 45 points | Lake Oval | 15,500 |} ===Premiership Season=== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%; text-align:center; width: 100%; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto" ! rowspan="2"| Rd ! rowspan="2"| Date and local time ! rowspan="2"| Opponent ! colspan="3"| Scores (Hawthorn's scores indicated in bold) ! rowspan="2"| Venue ! rowspan="2"| Attendance ! rowspan="2"| Record |- !
